New Records: Trayce Jackson-Davis is shooting 77.7% over the first five games
Key Match Events: Warriors had to play from behind most of Tuesday's contest, but started fast by making 12 of 23 shots (52.2%) to go ahead 28-20
Zion Williamson was held to 12 points on 5-for-20 shooting to go with 12 rebounds
Pre-Game Insights: Stephen Curry is scheduled to be re-evaluated Friday
Andrew Wiggins also sat out consecutive nights because of low back tightness
Post-Match Reflections: Golden State exercised the third-year contract option on second-year guard Brandin Podziemski
Klay Thompson will return with the Mavericks on November 12
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pelicans were without guards CJ McCollum and Herb Jones
The game was played at Chase Center with 18,064 attendance
